Aghilone

HOME ABOUT ME GAME PROJECTS
  • Holoprint 3D

    The app is about learning how to use a Ultimaker 3 3D Printer. This is an app on the Hololens 2, a mixed reality device by Microsoft.

  • WARNO

    My work spanned throughout all stages of map production, from shaping the forests and roads, to creating new structures.

  • A case study of Restorative Nostalgia: WORLD OF WARCRAFT CLASSIC

    An academic paper about World of Warcraft classic through the lenses of Restorative Nostalgia.

  • Boole and the Boulders

    This game was made for the 28th edition of the Legacy Mob Game Jam that lasted five days. The theme was Arcade.

  • Crême Glacée

    This prototype was made for the Ice Cream Jam by Christian Pulieri.

  • Frogzone

    This game was made for the 2021 Game Maker's Toolkit game jam joined by more than 20k people. The theme was Joined Together.
